When you right-click on that folder, and choose Properties, who is listed as the owner under "Permissions"?

What do you mean it says you "can't"?  What is the exact error?
You could also try this:  sudo chmod ug+rwxX /folder
Scratch that,...insert the -R like this:  sudo chmod -R ug+rwxX /folder
